.. published: 2026-01-01 0:00:00 UTC
.. summary: Recommended XMPP chat clients for mobile.
.. title: Recommended XMPP mobile chat clients
.. type: text

This is a sample article that showcases a custom XSLT stylesheet which is
intended for multimedia media galleries.

This gallery is realized by setting preambles of "links" with rel "related"
and "image" of the same title.

.. code:: rst

   title,href,rel,type
   Converse, /graphics/conversejs.svg, image, image/svg+xml
   Converse, https://conversejs.org, related

Schapps recommends and endorses these chat clients, although there is no attempt
to judge or compare them based on any criterion other than freedom; the software
herein are listed by the ease of installation and common purposes for mobile
devices.
